Package factory

Class DeviceFactory

java.lang.Object
factory.DeviceFactory
public class DeviceFactory extends Object
the DeviceFactory class is based on the "Factory Method" design pattern by the GoF. It offers a simple way to create instances of classes which implements the Device interface (not the decorators though). It is also a Singleton.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static DeviceFactory getInstance()
      Singleton pattern to ensure that there's only a single instance of DeviceFactory.
      Returns:
      the only DeviceFactory instance

    • availableTypesToString

      public String availableTypesToString()
      Returns:
      a String containing every device type that the DeviceFactory (and the whole system) supports.

    • createDevice

      public Device createDevice(String type, String name)
      Makes an instance of a given device-type class.
      Parameters:
      type - the class-name of the new instance. It's not case-sensitive.
      name - the name of the new instance.
      Returns:
      an instance of a class that implements Device of the given type.

    • lookFor

      public boolean lookFor(String typeName)
      Parameters:
      typeName - a class-name.
      Returns:
      true if a class with the specified class-name is supported by the DeviceFactory. false otherwise.
